narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Efcc Acquisition Corp is a Home Health provider based in Pittsburgh, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $46.6M in Medicaid payments across 174K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $46.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
